This directory contains images, diagrams, and other assets for documentation.

See `scripts/codemap/output/` for all 40 generated diagrams.

### Manual Assets

- `architecture.svg` - System architecture diagram ✅
- `component-hierarchy.svg` - React component structure ✅
- `platform-overview.svg` - Platform overview diagram ✅ (generated)

## Guidelines

### Image Formats

| Format | Use Case                    |
| ------ | --------------------------- |
| SVG    | Diagrams, icons, logos      |
| PNG    | Screenshots, complex images |
| WebP   | Photos, optimized images    |

### Naming Convention

- Use kebab-case: `component-hierarchy.svg`
- Be descriptive: `auth-flow-diagram.svg` not `diagram1.svg`
- Include version if needed: `architecture-v2.svg`

### Optimization

- Compress images before adding
- Use SVG for diagrams (scalable, small file size)
- Keep file sizes under 500KB when possible

### Adding New Assets

1. Optimize the image
2. Use descriptive filename
3. Add to this README if significant
4. Reference in documentation with relative path

```markdown
![Architecture](./assets/architecture.svg)
```
